courses.name: Advanced Programming & Software Development
courses.description: Master advanced programming concepts including data structures, algorithms, and software engineering principles. Learn multiple programming languages and build real-world applications.
courses.ideal_for: Students with strong analytical skills, high grades in computer science and mathematics, and passion for coding

instructor.name: Dr. Michael Chen
instructor.general_remarks: Demanding but fair professor. Expects high-quality code and thorough understanding of concepts. Provides excellent feedback and is very knowledgeable. Attendance is mandatory.

courses.name: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
courses.description: Explore the fascinating world of AI and ML. Learn neural networks, deep learning, natural language processing, and create intelligent systems.
courses.ideal_for: Students excelling in mathematics and computer science with curiosity about intelligent systems

instructor.name: Dr. Sarah Williams
instructor.general_remarks: Highly rigorous course with challenging assignments. Dr. Williams is a leading researcher in AI and expects students to keep up with latest developments. Grading is strict but she's very supportive during office hours.

courses.name: Biomedical Sciences
courses.description: Study the intersection of biology and medicine. Understand human physiology, diseases, drug development, and medical research methodologies.
courses.ideal_for: Students with excellent biology and chemistry grades who want to pursue healthcare

instructor.name: Dr. Patricia Martinez
instructor.general_remarks: Experienced professor with medical background. Very organized lectures and clear expectations. Encourages questions and provides practical insights from real-world medical cases. Lab work is intensive but well-structured.

courses.name: Environmental Science & Sustainability
courses.description: Learn about ecosystems, climate change, renewable energy, and sustainable practices. Make a difference in protecting our planet.
courses.ideal_for: Students interested in nature, ecology, and making positive environmental impact

instructor.name: Prof. James Anderson
instructor.general_remarks: Passionate about environmental issues and makes classes engaging with field trips and hands-on projects. Grading is reasonable and focuses on understanding concepts rather than memorization. Very approachable and helpful.

courses.name: Engineering Fundamentals & Robotics
courses.description: Build robots and understand engineering principles. Combine mechanical, electrical, and software engineering to create innovative solutions.
courses.ideal_for: Students strong in physics and math who love building things and solving technical problems

instructor.name: Dr. Robert Kim
instructor.general_remarks: Excellent engineer with industry experience. Projects are challenging but very rewarding. Expects precision and attention to detail. Very supportive in lab sessions and provides great mentorship for engineering careers.

courses.name: Entrepreneurship & Business Management
courses.description: Learn to start and manage businesses. Understand market analysis, business planning, finance, and leadership skills needed for entrepreneurial success.
courses.ideal_for: Students with entrepreneurial mindset, good communication skills, and interest in business

instructor.name: Prof. Lisa Thompson
instructor.general_remarks: Former entrepreneur with real-world business experience. Classes are interactive with case studies and group projects. Encourages creative thinking and practical application. Very engaging and motivational.

courses.name: Finance & Investment Analysis
courses.description: Master financial markets, investment strategies, portfolio management, and financial analysis. Learn to make data-driven financial decisions.
courses.ideal_for: Students strong in mathematics with interest in finance, markets, and investments

instructor.name: Dr. David Park
instructor.general_remarks: Former Wall Street analyst with deep knowledge of financial markets. Expects strong mathematical skills and analytical thinking. Assignments are challenging but prepare students well for finance careers. Office hours are very helpful.

courses.name: Digital Arts & Creative Design
courses.description: Explore digital art, graphic design, animation, and visual storytelling. Use cutting-edge tools to bring your creative visions to life.
courses.ideal_for: Creative students with artistic talent and interest in digital media

instructor.name: Prof. Maria Garcia
instructor.general_remarks: Creative and inspiring professor. Fosters artistic expression and provides constructive feedback. Portfolio reviews are thorough but encouraging. Very supportive of student creativity and experimentation.

courses.name: Film & Media Production
courses.description: Learn filmmaking, video production, storytelling, and media creation. From scriptwriting to post-production, master the art of visual storytelling.
courses.ideal_for: Students with creative writing skills and interest in visual media and storytelling

instructor.name: Prof. Christopher Lee
instructor.general_remarks: Award-winning filmmaker with industry connections. Hands-on approach to teaching with practical filmmaking projects. Very passionate about storytelling and helps students develop their unique voice. Collaborative and supportive.

courses.name: Psychology & Human Behavior
courses.description: Understand the human mind and behavior. Study cognitive processes, emotions, mental health, and social psychology.
courses.ideal_for: Students interested in understanding people, good communication skills, and empathy

instructor.name: Dr. Jennifer Brown
instructor.general_remarks: Empathetic and understanding professor with clinical experience. Makes complex psychological concepts accessible. Encourages class discussions and critical thinking. Very approachable and creates a supportive learning environment.

courses.name: Sports Science & Athletic Training
courses.description: Combine your love for sports with science. Learn sports physiology, nutrition, athletic training, and sports management.
courses.ideal_for: Athletic students with interest in sports and basic understanding of biology

instructor.name: Prof. Mark Johnson
instructor.general_remarks: Former professional athlete turned educator. Very energetic and motivating. Combines theory with practical training sessions. Encourages active participation and values effort. Very supportive of student athletes.

courses.name: Music Production & Sound Engineering
courses.description: Create and produce music using professional tools. Learn sound engineering, mixing, mastering, and music composition.
courses.ideal_for: Students with musical talent and interest in technology-driven music creation

instructor.name: Prof. Alex Rodriguez
instructor.general_remarks: Professional music producer with industry experience. Very hands-on with studio equipment and software. Encourages creativity and experimentation. Provides detailed feedback on student projects. Passionate about music technology.

courses.name: Legal Studies & Public Policy
courses.description: Study law, legal systems, public policy, and justice. Develop skills in legal analysis, argumentation, and civic understanding.
courses.ideal_for: Students with strong communication skills, interest in justice, and debate capabilities

instructor.name: Dr. Elizabeth White
instructor.general_remarks: Former judge with extensive legal experience. Socratic method of teaching - expects students to be well-prepared. Very sharp and challenges students' arguments. Demanding but prepares students excellently for legal careers. Reading assignments are heavy.

courses.name: Data Science & Analytics
courses.description: Learn to extract insights from data. Master statistical analysis, data visualization, and predictive modeling using modern tools.
courses.ideal_for: Students strong in math with interest in finding patterns and insights in data

instructor.name: Dr. Kevin Zhang
instructor.general_remarks: Data science expert with strong statistical background. Expects proficiency in programming and mathematics. Projects are data-intensive and require analytical thinking. Very knowledgeable and provides excellent resources. Office hours are valuable.

courses.name: Architecture & Urban Design
courses.description: Design buildings and urban spaces. Combine creativity with technical skills in sustainable architecture and urban planning.
courses.ideal_for: Creative students with good spatial awareness and interest in design and construction

instructor.name: Prof. Richard Moore
instructor.general_remarks: Renowned architect with award-winning designs. Very creative and encourages innovative thinking. Portfolio reviews are detailed and constructive. Combines artistic vision with technical precision. Supportive mentor for aspiring architects.

courses.name: Communications & Journalism
courses.description: Master the art of communication. Learn journalism, public relations, media writing, and digital communication strategies.
courses.ideal_for: Students with excellent writing skills and interest in media and communication

instructor.name: Prof. Susan Davis
instructor.general_remarks: Veteran journalist with decades of experience. Very practical approach with real-world assignments. Provides detailed feedback on writing. Encourages investigative thinking and ethical journalism. Very approachable and supportive.

courses.name: Advanced Chemistry & Chemical Engineering
courses.description: Dive deep into chemical processes, reactions, and engineering applications. From pharmaceuticals to materials science.
courses.ideal_for: Students excelling in chemistry with interest in scientific research and applications

instructor.name: Dr. Thomas Wilson
instructor.general_remarks: Research-focused professor with extensive publications. Lab work is rigorous and requires precision. Expects thorough understanding of chemical principles. Very knowledgeable and provides excellent theoretical foundation. Safety in lab is paramount.

courses.name: Game Development & Design
courses.description: Create video games from concept to completion. Learn game design, programming, graphics, and user experience design.
courses.ideal_for: Students who love gaming with skills in programming and creativity

instructor.name: Prof. Daniel Taylor
instructor.general_remarks: Game industry veteran with shipped titles. Very hands-on with game engines and development tools. Encourages creativity and innovation. Projects are fun but require technical skills. Very supportive of student game projects and portfolios.

courses.name: Performing Arts & Theater
courses.description: Express yourself through performance. Learn acting, voice training, stage presence, and theater production.
courses.ideal_for: Expressive students with creativity and confidence in performing

instructor.name: Prof. Amanda Foster
instructor.general_remarks: Professional actress and director with theater experience. Very encouraging and helps students overcome stage fright. Focuses on building confidence and expression. Creates a safe and supportive environment for performance. Very passionate about theater arts.

courses.name: Cybersecurity & Ethical Hacking
courses.description: Protect digital systems from threats. Learn ethical hacking, security protocols, cryptography, and cyber defense strategies.
courses.ideal_for: Students with strong computer science skills and interest in security and problem-solving

instructor.name: Dr. Ryan Mitchell
instructor.general_remarks: Former security consultant with real-world hacking experience. Very demanding with high expectations for security knowledge. Hands-on labs are challenging and realistic. Expects ethical behavior and thorough understanding of security principles. Excellent preparation for cybersecurity careers.
